snippet: South Korean prosecutors on Thursday detained the chief executive of the company that owns the ferry that sank last month over an allegation of cargo overloading.
abstract: South Korean prosecutors detained chief executive of company that owns the ferry that sank in April over an allegation of cargo overloading.
lead_paragraph: South Korean prosecutors on Thursday detained the chief executive of the company that owns the ferry that sank last month over an allegation of cargo overloading.
